metadata.title: RA and FSP Curriculum: I-006 Introduction to IAR and EWARM for RA

sections.content:
This introductory curriculum course provides the basics needed to develop FSP based projects using IAR and EWARM. 
I-006 Introduction to IAR and EWARM for RA for FSP 4.3.0- an overview presentation covering the key topics needed to select target devices and boards, create and use projects, include and configure project modules, and debug a simple project. The presentation includes a step-by-step process that shows the student how to install, create a project, compile and debug a design.
  The course PDF file is attached below along with a PPT for the FSP 4.0.0 version.
  All Introductory RA and FSP courses are listed here.
  Tutorial    workshop    how-to    guide  quickstart  getting started  course
